messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Clash of the Titans/affording going to the movies

messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: SandraDodd@...

**We have been doing "popcorn innoculation" here before movies.**


Too funny, I have to try this. It would definitely work for me, I always get my fill of popcorn before the movie starts anyway. I wonder about the rest of my family? hmmmmm..

We might be able to afford more movies then. :)

Kelli~ the movie crazy woman (35 days, 13 hours and 43 minutes 'til Return of the King comes out! That's what my screen saver says anyway.)



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
